dataset_id: SMAPVEX12 UAVSAR Incidence-Angle Normalized Backscatter Data V001
organizations: NASA DAAC at the National Snow and Ice Data Center
title: SMAPVEX12 UAVSAR Incidence-Angle Normalized Backscatter Data V001
summary: This data set contains backscatter data obtained by the Uninhabited Aerial Vehicle Synthetic Aperture Radar (UAVSAR) instrument as partof the Soil Moisture Active Passive Validation Experiment 2012 (SMAPVEX12).
